user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable and supportive undergarments that I could wear daily without discomfort or the need to frequently adjust them.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a comfortable and supportive bra that I could purchase online without the hassle of going to stores. The features such as the non-slip adjustable straps, foam-lined cups, and the overall construction appealed to me, as I wanted something that wouldn't dig into my skin or slip out of place. The positive experience I had with my previous online purchase of a sports bra also influenced my decision.

I needed a comfortable bra for everyday wear, and the affordability of the 3-pack was appealing. However, I found that while it was comfortable, it lacked the support I was looking for. The brand's reputation for quality also played a role in my decision.

I was in search of a wireless bra that offered both support and comfort. The detailed description of the construction, including the Magic Ring® and TruSupport® systems, convinced me that this product would meet my needs. The emphasis on comfort and fit was crucial, as I wanted something that would not bind or cause discomfort throughout the day.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer comfort, quality, and versatility. I value items that are well-made, soft, and provide a good fit without being restrictive. I appreciate the ability to customize or choose from different styles, as seen in my preference for interchangeable straps or reversible designs. Additionally, I tend to favor products that are reasonably priced and provide good value for money. On the other hand, I dislike items that lack support or have poor construction, as well as those that do not fit well or are difficult to use. I also find it unappealing when products do not meet my expectations in terms of quality or comfort.

conversation.content: I want to find comfortable and supportive undergarments that I can wear daily without discomfort or the need for frequent adjustments. within my expected price range: [18.99, 22.5]
What specific type of undergarments are you looking for? (e.g., bras, panties, boxers, etc.)
I'm looking for comfortable and supportive bras that I can wear daily without discomfort or the need for frequent adjustments.
What cup size are you looking for in the comfortable and supportive bras for daily wear?
I usually look for bras in cup sizes ranging from B to D, depending on the brand and fit.

But that is untrue, you not only need something that looks nice, but more importantly something that offers ultimate comfort.Your underwear should feel good and not distract from activity your taking part in.', 'GENERAL FEATURES:', 'Made of 100% Extra fine durable, soft Cotton for superior comfort Classic fit, perfect for layering Available in many sizes & colors (Check size chart above) Full shoulder design for a conservative appearance High neckline for a Modest Coverage Machine wash warm. Tumble dry low', 'Comfort + Quality + Style', "The Rosette Sleeveless Tank Top Undershirt is a must-have in any women's closet. The extra soft cotton material allows for all day wear during any type of activity, whether you're at the office or at home.Full shouldered tank straps conceal bra straps for a more put together look. They are very stretchy with a Nice ribbon trim around the neck and arms.", 'Natural Cotton – Eco-Friendly', 'Ideal for women with Sensitive skin and Sensory issues. Great for Sleeping, Lounging, Pajamas and Just for layering, or plain wearing clean finish bottom to wear tucked in or tucked out with the everyday essentials.', 'Get it, Feel it, Prove it!', 'Get the Rosette’s top rated tank shirt for ladies and girls today by clicking “Add to Cart” on top of the page and feel the difference.'] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Panties, Cotton Brief Underwear Multi-Pack (Retired Options)> / Item ID: B0BRJSSTPD / Price: $17.44 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If briefs are your style, you can't do better than Hanes® best lightweight cotton briefs. This comfy brief underwear is made with Hanes® Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. Plus these undies are made of ring-spun cotton that's oh so soft against your skin. You'll also appreciate the plush waistband that won't pinch or bind. The silhouette is a classic brief with full coverage in front and back plus a high-rise waist for a sleek, smooth look under clothes. These lightweight briefs have comfort leg bands that stay in place without riding up and are available in a convenient 3-pack of assorted colors. Even better, these classic brief undies are tagless for itch-free comfort."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Bali Women's Comfort Revolution Seamless Hi-Cut> / Item ID: B08YXC41MD / Price: $8.66 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['A no-ride-up design, Bali® women’s Comfort Revolution® hi-cut panty is made for the woman on-the-go. Designed with Cool Comfort® moisture-wicking nylon fabric, this women’s panty will keep you comfortable all-day long. The high-cut, seamless panty features a tag-free design that won’t chafe or dig. Narrow leg bands and a knit-in waistband help minimize panty lines for a smooth finish. A classic high-rise design, Bali® seamless women’s underwear offers full front and back coverage so you can move with confidence.']
